name: Harry Potter Name Generator
description: Accio, awesome name! Need a magical moniker for your fanfic, RPG character, or just because? Conjure up the perfect Harry Potter-esque name with our generator! From noble wizarding families to quirky shopkeepers, we've got you covered. Prepare to be sorted... into a name!
introduction: Ever wondered what your name would be if you were a student at Hogwarts? Or perhaps a mysterious figure lurking in the shadows of Knockturn Alley? Our Harry Potter Name Generator is here to help you discover your magical identity. Whether you're seeking a name steeped in tradition or something a little more…unconventional, we've got a spell for that!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. We've already brewed the potion, so no need to worry about exploding cauldrons!
Keep clicking until a name resonates with your inner wizard (or witch!).
Feeling creative? Tweak the prefixes and suffixes to craft a truly unique name.
Share your awesome new name with your fellow Potterheads! Let the magic spread!

faqs.question: Are these names actually from the Harry Potter books?
faqs.answer: While some elements are inspired by the books, most names are creatively generated to evoke the spirit of the wizarding world. We're crafting new magic, not stealing old spells!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my fanfiction?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! That's exactly what they're for. Feel free to use them as inspiration or adopt them wholesale. Just don't blame us if J.K. Rowling suddenly writes you into the canon.

faqs.question: Are the names gender-specific?
faqs.answer: Not necessarily! Many names can work for both male and female characters. However, some prefixes and suffixes might lean more towards one gender. Experiment and see what feels right!

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes and suffixes?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Send them our way, and we might just add them to the mix. The more magical ingredients, the better!

faqs.question: Is this generator powered by actual magic?
faqs.answer: Well... we can't reveal all our secrets, can we? Let's just say a little bit of Felix Felicis might have been involved.

faqs.question: What if I don't like the name I get?
faqs.answer: No worries! Just hit 'Generate' again. There are countless possibilities, so you're bound to find one that speaks to your inner wizard or witch. The magic never ends!

prefixes: He Who Must Not Be Named
